Monitoring

Monitoring for publisher

The stats emitted from publisher are documented here : Publisher stats

The publisher factory reads the emitter configuration from a file specified in configuration property statemitter.filename. See Monitoring section for more details.

Monitoring for Consumer

The stats emitted from the consumer are documented here

The consumer factory reads the emitter configuration from a file specified in configuration property consumer.statemitter.filename. See Monitoring section for more details.

Configuration

User should specify the implementation of the StatEmitter class for the configuration className. See sample configuration at statemitter.properties. The available configuration properties are described Here.
